content: Here is the Online Directory for the 111th Congress. “http://www.visi.com/juan/congress/” Click on your State and find your representatives. Tell them how you feel, send them this "http://www.bornagainamerican.org/" Ask, how, are they to vote on Military and Veterans issues. Why do they need to keep spending money we, the American people don’t have, why is “earmarking” BILLIONS of tax dollars to worthless projects (earthworm farms, bird c**p studies, which way the wind blows during any day of the year, the “bridge to nowhere”) are more important than Americans facing mortgage foreclosures, job losses due to jobs going over seas to china, japan, and third world countries! It’s not up to America to support the ENTIRE WORLD! That’s not in their job description, to SAVE the economy of non Americans! Rant over…. “http://www.senate.gov/” “https://writerep.house.gov/writerep/welcome.shtml” The house: "http://www.house.gov/" Its got some good sites to go to. “http://www.congress.org/congressorg/home/” Go here to find how they voted: “http://www.congress.org/congressorg/dbq/issuesdbq/votesearch.dbq” Break glass…in case of Emergency! Or, just wait till I get to the bottom of the bottle!
